title: Mathewson, Wheat, Griffith + a dozen SL'ers--
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: Mathewson, Wheat, Griffith + a dozen SL'ers--
posts.post_content:
Page 1:  --SOLD--  

Mathewson, dark cap [Poor/MC--measures short but apparently not trimmed, otherwise solid], $175, --SOLD--  
Chesbro [G-VG], --SOLD--
McGraw portrait with cap [F-G], --SOLD--  
Wheat [Poor, maybe a little better], $50, --SOLD--  
Marquard, hands at side [looks G-VG and measures okay, but top and bottom look incongruous, so it could be trimmed and I'll discount it as such], $55, --SOLD-- 
Griffith batting [good front, neat backstamp--"PAID"--but spoiled/Poor because of paper-loss], $40. --SOLD--  

Wheat is an RC, for what that's worth.  Flat rate $3 S/H for one or two.  Take all three for $250 delivered. 

Page 2, ranging from Poor to G-VG, $35-$60 each; add flat-rate $3 S/H.  Discount on bundles.  Note that, as the page turns, the backs are in opposite order:

A.O. Jordan, F-G, --SOLD-- 
A.O. Jordan, F-G, --SOLD-- 
Carey, F-G, --SOLD--
Hart, Montgomery, Old Mill, F-G,
Stark, San Antonio, G-VG,
Westlake, Danville, G+,--SOLD--
King, Danville, Old Mill, G, --SOLD--
King, Danville, G, --SOLD--
Rockenfeld, Montgomery ["5-sided," otherwise VG-Ex], --SOLD--
Westlake, Danville ["5-sided," otherwise VG-Ex], --SOLD--
Greminger, Montgomery [Poor, note paper-loss in bottom right-hand corner, good spot, not too noticeable],
Foley White, Houston, Old Mill, P-F --SOLD--
 



Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No pm's, please; my pm box is constantly full].
Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No messages on ppff; thanks] or personal check; regular paypal, add 3%.

First to say he'll take it gets it. Add $3 for S/H; second card ships for free; all three for $260 delivered.
Received them yesterday, they look great.  Thanks Doug!
